entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
